attributes.action: A knighthood for Capt Tom Moore (retd) for the fundraising for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: This gentleman who is 99 years old as of today 16/04/2020 has raised almost 12 million pounds for the NHS
attributes.background: I would like parliament to petition Her majesty the Queen to award Capt Tom Moore (Retd)  either a KBE or a GBE

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
